alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Madison River Valley; Missouri Headwaters; Snowy and Judith Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 21 at 3:56PM MST until November 24 at 6:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of mostly between 3 and 7 inches possible, but up to 10 inches possible above mountain pass level. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph, mainly Thursday afternoon and evening. * WHERE...Portions of central and southwest Montana. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, mainly Thursday afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
